topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53dec2526368723aa6640000#post_53dec2526368723aa6640000
Yes, they are well made. I loved Monsters Inc. and Despicable Me. And I admit I'm taking a liking towards.... Elsa. But I just wish these medias were operated and owned by a nicer company. :c
And that 2D can coexist with CGI in today's world.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53dec0aa6368721158990100#post_53dec0aa6368721158990100
*Puts gun to his head*

no, you're dead Pro-CGI. 

but seriously though.

Let me get this straight, I don't _mind_ CGI.

CGI doesn't mean the film is automatically garbage, just look at things like UP, Toy story, and Finding Nemo and other movies.

those movies were fucking beautiful! But what I'm getting at is CGI has gotten waaaay to prevalent, come on, fucking Disney said themselves that they are not making anymore 2D movies.

And that's crap cuz out of anyone Disney can fucking afford to make those movies!

Hand drawn animated movies have just been getting really hard to find now, and that sucks as a lot of heart warming and lovely movies have come from it. If anything 2D doesn't deserve the turned eyes its been getting.

It deserves a lot more then that.
